item.description: Basic notion in reinforce learning. Agent, state, action, policy, reward, state transition and value function.

item.title: Reinfroce Learning Note 2: Value-based Learning
item.description:
Value-based Learning

credit:

Bellman equation - Wikipedia

Temporal Difference Learning - 知乎 (zhihu.com)

蒙特卡洛梯度估计方法（MCGE）简述 - 知乎 (zhihu.com)

强化学习 - 时间差分学习(Temporal-Difference Learning) - 知乎 (zhihu.com)

Outline

Goal of RL

Win the game. It can be described by maximizing the expected return.

Challenge

Q1. How to choose an action with better return as $U_t$ is random variable?

A1. Expectation. The action-value function use expectation to remove the influence of future randomness.

Q2. How can I choose currently best action if we had known $Q^*$, the optimal value function?
